thread.title: Harshika Poonacha in a Madhur Bhandarkar movie?
thread.title_full: Harshika Poonacha in a Madhur Bhandarkar movie? - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Harshika Poonacha in a Madhur Bhandarkar movie?
text:
Harshika Poonacha came back from her long holiday in the US, looking like a brand new person. The pretty actress got quite the makeover and got a sexy photoshoot done.
The actress was recently in Mumbai, where she met Bollywood director Madhur Bhandarkar . Harshika uploaded a picture with the director on her Twitter page, with the caption, "In Mumbai with the dynamic director of Bollywood Madhur Bandarkar sir üòç @imbhandarkar Pleasure indeed üòä"
So, will we soon see Harshika in a Madhur film? Watch this space for more..
